src:
Fuzhou China Open: Jonatan Kalahkan Shesar
06 Nov 2019, 17:13 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Jonatan Christie berhasil lolos ke babak 16 besar Fuzhou China Open. (dok.PBSI)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Jonatan Christie berhasil lolos ke babak kedua turnamen badminton Fuzhou China Open setelah mengalahkan Shesar Hiren Rhustavito, 21-18, 21-17, Rabu (6/11).Jonatan mengawali pertandingan dengan raihan tiga poin beruntun. Namun Shesar kemudian sempat merebut keunggulan pada angka 5-4.Jonatan mulai menjauh pada skor 9-6 usai mendapat empat poin beruntun. Pertandingan kemudian dikuasai Shesar yang mampu menyamakan skor 9-9 sebelum akhirnya melesat dengan catatan enam poin berurutan yang membuatnya unggul 15-10.Jonatan berusaha keras untuk menyamakan kedudukan dan akhirnya bisa mengimbangi perolehan poin Shesar di angka 17-17 sebelum kemudian memimpin 18-17.Meski skor sempat imbang 18-18, Jonatan mampu menutup gim pertama dengan kemenangan 21-18.Pada gim kedua, Jonatan lebih dominan dalam perolehan poin. Shesar kesulitan mengimbangi Jonatan.Jonatan langsung melesat dengan keunggulan 7-1 di awal gim pertama sebelum akhirnya menjauh dengan selisih enam poin di angka 13-7.Jonatan lalu meraih match point pada angka 20-13. Meski sempat gagal di empat kesempatan pertama, Jonatan sukses menyelesaikan permainan dengan skor 21-17 di akhir gim kedua.Pada pertandingan sebelumnya, Tommy Sugiarto gagal melangkah ke babak kedua usai tumbangd i tangan pebulutangkis India, Sai Praneeth. Meski sempat menang 21-15 di gim pertama, Tommy kalah 12-21, 10-21 di dua gim selanjutnya.Di nomor ganda putri, Greysia Polii/Apriyani Rahayu yang jadi unggulan keenam juga tidak mampu menjejakkan kaki ke babak berikutnya. Greysia/Apriyani kalah dari ganda Malaysia, Chow Mei Kuan/Lee Meng Yean, 19-21, 16-21. (ptr)
text:
Fuzhou China Open: Jonatan Defeats Shesar
Nov 6 2019, 17:13 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Jonatan Christie made it to the last 16 of the Fuzhou China Open. (doc.PBSI)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Jonatan Christie made it to the second round of the Fuzhou China Open badminton tournament after defeating Shesar Hiren Rhustavito, 21-18, 21-17, Wednesday (6/11) .Jonatan started the match with three points in a row. But Shesar then took the lead at 5-4. Jonathan began to move away at a score of 9-6 after getting four points in a row. The match was then dominated by Shesar who was able to equalize the score 9-9 before finally bolting with a record of six consecutive points that made him superior 15-10. Jonathan tried hard to equalize and was finally able to compensate for Shesar's points at 17-17 before then leading 18-17 . Even though the score was even 18-18, Jonatan was able to close the first game with a 21-18 win. In the second game, Jonatan was more dominant in the acquisition of points. Shesar struggled to keep up with Jonatan. Jonathan immediately shot with a 7-1 advantage at the beginning of the first game before finally moving away with a difference of six points at 13-7. Jonathan then won the match point at 20-13. Although he failed on the first four occasions, Jonatan successfully completed the game with a score of 21-17 at the end of the second game. In the previous game, Tommy Sugiarto failed to step into the second round after the fall of the Indian badminton player, Sai Praneeth. Despite having won 21-15 in the first game, Tommy lost 12-21, 10-21 in the next two games. In the women's doubles number, Greysia Polii / Apriyani Rahayu who became the sixth seed was also unable to set foot into the next round. Greysia / Apriyani lost to Malaysian doubles, Chow Mei Kuan / Lee Meng Yean, 19-21, 16-21. (ptr)
